headline: EIT SPOTCURE OPTICAL POWER METER
categories.lvl1: Test & Measurement Equipment > Optical Test & Measurement Equipment
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Optical Test & Measurement Equipment > Optical Power Meters
specstable:
Manufacturer EIT
Model Spotcure UV Intensity Meter
Other Information Measures UV intensity up to 19.99W/cm2
Accepts multiple light guide sizes 5, 7, and 10 mm
7mm Light guide adaptor included
Other sizes guide adaptors available from EIT
Intensity range: 0-19.99W/cm2
Resolution: 10mW/cm2
Accuracy: ±5% typical, ±10% maximum
Display: 3 1/2 digit LCD
Configured to 320-390nm (UVA)
Battery-powered
Exterior Dimensions
Width 2.120 in (5.4 cm)
Height 6.375 in (16.2 cm)
